com.teamonehundred.pixelboat

Class SceneBoatSelection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.SceneBoatSelection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scene

    public class SceneBoatSelection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scene
    Represents the Boat Selection Scene for when the player wants to select which boat to play with before the race starts.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public int update()
        Update function for SceneBoatSelection. Ends SceneBoatSelection based on user input otherwise stays in scene.

        Returns an specified integer when you want to exit the screen else return scene_id if you want to stay in scene.

        Specified by:
        update in interface Scene
        Returns:
        returns an integer which is the scene_id of which screen is next (either this screen still or another)

      • draw

        public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Draw function for SceneBoatSelection.

        Draws BoatSelection for the PixelBoat game.

        Specified by:
        draw in interface Scene
        Parameters:
        batch - SpriteBatch used for drawing to screen.

        Specified by:
